nodes.text: Cosians were a species of sentient reptilian humanoids from Cosia who had beaked mouths, four-fingered hands, eyes with lids that blinked upward instead of down, and a long tail that ended in a tuft of hair. Jedi Master Tera Sinube, a member of the Jedi Order during the Clone Wars, was a Cosian. Cosians spoke Cosian, a trilling, chirping language. The language mingled with the sounds of their homeworld, Cosia.
Nu-Cosian species was a genetically-engineered subspecies of the Cosians.
